question: The Future of Jobs Report 2020' has been released by which organisation?
explanation:
Switzerland-based World Economic Forum (WEF) has recently released a report titled 'The Future of Jobs Report 2020'.
As per the report, advances in robotics and artificial intelligence will lead to a net increase in jobs over the next five years. It also revealed that the Covid-19 pandemic will result in “double-disruption” for workers.
